# WordPress.com Customizer Device Preview (Polyfill)

Temporary polyfill for WordPress.com feature while waiting for addition to VIP Quickstart.

**Contributors:** [westonruter](https://profiles.wordpress.org/westonruter), [xwp](https://profiles.wordpress.org/xwp)  
**Requires at least:** 4.1  
**Tested up to:** 4.1  
**Stable tag:** trunk (master)  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

This is a temporary polyfill plugin for a WordPress.com feature while waiting for it to be [added to VIP Quickstart](https://github.com/Automattic/vip-quickstart/issues/405).

The JS and CSS assets in this plugin were copied from WordPress.com's CDN and de-obfuscated.
